Body:
Description: I would like to ask you some question about the implementation and the authentication process. I tried to find info in the installation guide but some things are not clear enough for me.

My design is as follow:

I have installed pingcastle basic on satellite servers on servers from all domains I need to scan. And they should send the reports to the centralized server where pingcastle enterprise is installed. How does this work exactly. I would like to automate this using ansible job scheduled at a certain time. I see there is a need to call an API from the satellite server, how does it work and  what is the authentication process between the pingcastle basic servers and the pingcastle enterprise server please ?

Also, If I already have reports that I have run previously how can I import them on the enterprise server please ?
What We've Learned Updated: customer tries to login but a generic error message appears after inserting credentials, as shown in the screenshot sent
Next Steps Updated: scheduled a meeting in order to see what exactly the issue is, as it might have several causes
What We've Learned Updated: customer tries to login, by creating a new user, but a generic error message appears after inserting credentials, as shown in the screenshot sent
Steps to Reproduce Updated: at the first login into enterprise version, where a new use has to be created, a generic error message appears after inserting credentials, as shown in the screenshot sent

Next Steps Updated: scheduled a meeting in order to see what exactly the issue is, as it might have several causes
after meeting, found out a bug into the application when creating the user, for the time being a workaround was found ( email is mandatory )
